availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Burnett (Hickman County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, merchant. Tennessee native. Son of Brooken J. Barnett and Letha Barnett. Married to Mary L. Burnett. Father of Gus Henry Burnett. Student in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Potato Patch in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman, p. 4A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Potato Patch, p. 579.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Feliciana, p. 78A.
